name: 3D Drift Car Parking - Sports Car City Racing and Drifting Championship Simulator: Free Arcade Game
name_original: 3D Drift Car Parking - Sports Car City Racing and Drifting Championship Simulator: Free Arcade Game
description:
[IMPORTANT: Due to high quality 3D graphics, this game may not work on older devices] Drift Car drivers unite! Take on a seriously difficult racing challenge. Navigate and drift your sports car through the city streets. Get through the level and park at the blue spot at the end. Day or night, the city awaits. Drive 10 incredible, real life drift cars and live life sideways. Earn money to buy faster cars to beat harder levels. Finish the game and unlock 2 sandbox levels for unlimited free play. It's a drifting game like you've never played before.

Features:
• Huge city to explore in day or night conditions
• 12 challenging levels
• 10 authentic drift cars
• Change car colors in the garage
• Fresh dubstep music tracks
• Collect Drift coins to earn money
• Video replay – Share with your friends

Note on Drifting Physics: This game uses realistic physics. Just like in real life, drifting is challenging and requires some technique and speed. You'll need to get some speed, swing wide entering a corner and then immediately counter-steer the opposite direction. The physics have been tuned for precise control in a tight city environment. Because this is also a parking game, smashing into things means you failed to park. It's challenging, but once you get the hang of it, we think you'll find it to be a rewarding experience.

Compatiblity Information: Due to high quality 3D graphics and level size, this game requires 1024 mb of ram and may not run on older devices. Recommended iPad 3 and up, iPad Mini 2 and up & iPhone 5 and up. Please consider the minimum specs before leaving us a bad review :) Thanks!
